snippet.title: Rogue Night Demo Announcement Trailer!
snippet.description:
Rogue Night is a rogue lite survival game - Confront hordes of undead, gather resources to build and survive. Explore locations and rescue NPCs who will aid on your journey. 
___

Download the demo here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2797640/Rogue_Night/

Find the most up to date info here: https://x.com/GreyNovGames
Join the discord for Steam key giveaways: https://discord.gg/UyS8FQp75V

Music by Nicole Marie T.
